Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RNST-2-14K (RSP-1, Synthetic AMPs, XXD, XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is unique and shows only very low similarity (60%) toLausporin-1L:21%, G=K=F:Chemical modification: A10: D-amino acid; C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus NCTC 13277 MRSA (MIC 6.25 uM), B. subtilis ATCC 23857 (MIC 1.56 uM), Gram- S. typhi ATCC 14028 (MIC 50 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 25 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 10145 (MIC 50 uM), and fungi C. albicans ATCC 36082 (MIC 15.6 uM).Structure:  helical in 20 mM SDS.In vitro toxicity: human RBC: HC50 51 uM. Hemolytic. Breast cancer cells MCF-7 (IC50 42.7 uM), cervical cancer Hela cells (IC50 33.5 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Abdullah SJ, Guan JS, Mu Y, Bhattacharjya S.2024
Literature Information.Title: Synthesis of Temporin-SHa Retro Analogs with Lysine Addition/Substitution and Antibiotic Conjugation to Enhance Antibacterial, Antifungal, and Anticancer Activities.
